articles.title: Europe to consider 'dose-sparing' to increase monkeypox vaccine - Global Times
articles.description: Health officials in Europe are discussing whether to follow a move by the United States to stretch out scarce monkeypox vaccine supplies, with the World Health Organization (WHO) calling for more data.
articles.content:
A healthcare worker prepares to administer a vaccine to a person for the prevention of monkeypox on July 12, 2022 in Florida, the US. Photo: VCG
